casebody.data:
Hendricks, Appellant, v. Richland County Court of Common Pleas, Appellee.

[Cite as Hendricks v. Richland Cty. Court of Common Pleas (1994), 69 Ohio St.3d 616.]

(No. 94-585 Submitted June 15, 1994 Decided July 27, 1994.) Mark T. Hendricks, pro se. James J. Mayer, Jr., Richland County Prosecuting Attorney, and Stephen M. Wildermuth, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellee.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed.

Moyer, C.J., A.W. Sweeney, Douglas, Wright, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney and Pfeifer, JJ., concur.
